EmailTemplate.subject: Temporary Office Building for {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello! Are you looking for an affordable and efficient workspace solution?
BOXX Modular currently has a pre-owned 4,100 sq. ft. modular office available with 12 individual offices and 2 restrooms! This building is ready to be delivered for rent or sale to accommodate your growing business. View the building details --> 70' x 60' Used Modular Office Building | https://www.boxxmodular.com/used-modular/oc-00506/ Visit our website today to explore our complete selection of modular solutions and our team will help you find the perfect fit for your needs. --> View used building inventory | https://www.boxxmodular.com/used-modular/ --> View modular office complexes | https://www.boxxmodular.com/offices/complexes/ --> View mobile office selection | https://www.boxxmodular.com/offices/mobile/
To connect with us for more information: --> Reply to this email --> Request a quote on our website | https://www.boxxmodular.com/quote-request/ --> Call 877-966-7839 to speak with one of our local experts
We are here to help!
